DOC.brief_summary: The Clinical Research Ethics Committee , Cork comprise faculty representative , external representative , legal representative appropriate individual ex-officio administrative member need expertise . Ethics Committee member , include Chair , appoint Head College , University College Cork , Medical School . The Ethics Committee meet month .
DOC.brief_title: Study Compare Milk Protein Isolate ( MPI ) With Caseinate Terms Protein Utilization
DOC.criteria: To consider eligible enrolment study , subject must ; 1 . Be able give write informed consent . 2 . Be 65 75 year age . 3 . Be generally good health determine investigator . 4 . Have evidence gastrointestinal disease functional gastrointestinal disorder determine Bowel Disease Questionnaire . 5 . Have stable body weight past 3months . 6 . Have Body Mass Index ( BMI ) great 22 , male 20 female less 30 . 7 . Have satisfactory nutritional status . Subjects exclude study meet criterion ; 1 . Are less 65 great 75 year age . 2 . Have evidence gastrointestinal disease functional gastrointestinal disorder determine Bowel Disease Questionnaire . 3 . Have significant acute chronic coexist illness ( cardiovascular , gastrointestinal , endocrinological , immunological , metabolic condition contraindicates , investigator judgement , entry study ) . 4 . Having condition take medication investigator believe would interfere objective study , pose safety risk confound interpretation study result ; include antiinflammatory drug , corticosteroid , laxative , enema , antibiotic ( within 1 month ) , anticoagulant , overthe counter nonsteroidal analgesic . Subjects washout period twoweeks . 5 . Be smoker . 6 . Consume recommend alcohol guideline i.e . 34 alcohol unit day man woman 23 unit day . 7 . Suffer psychiatric disease 8 . Prior gastrointestinal surgery ( apart appendicectomy hernia repair ) recent unexplained bleeding . 9 . Have dietary habit ( slimming vegetarian diet ) could interfere assessment study product . 10 . Individuals , opinion investigator , consider poor attendee unlikely reason able comply trial . 11 . Subjects may receive treatment involve experimental drug . 12 . If subject recent experimental trial , must complete less 30 day prior study . 13 . Have malignant disease concomitant endstage organ disease
